name: Honey Heist (CGCOOKE, jtn191, Obionekid, EnterLightning, whatswithandy, pixelcrustpunk)
name_original: Honey Heist (CGCOOKE, jtn191, Obionekid, EnterLightning, whatswithandy, pixelcrustpunk)
description:
On this planet of bears, he who has the honey is king.... And when it comes to colonizing bees, the evil Barclay C. Banks III reigns supreme.

In Honey Heist, you will join the rebels of project X-Comb to help save the bee population from extinction at the hands of Barclay’s empire. Playing as Lock Fozzington, the leader of project X-Comb, you will pilot your Elite Bee racer, Goldie, in an effort to beat Barclay to the Three Queens of Clawtopia. Across three unique worlds, you will have to avoid Barclay’s gangsters and henchmen, collect as much honey as possible, and get to the Queens before Barclay does. Fly fast… The fate of bee-kind is in your hands.
